name: Sweet Dreams (NightZard Productions)
description:
This is Sweet Dreams! Our game for the 'Geta Game Jam 8' Game jam. 

You play a little boy named Doony, the protagonist. Doony is a four year old boy who has just been put to sleep in bed and is now dreaming about some weird things.. Unicorns, a party, Monsters..  Will they kill you? Or will you kill them?

Key Features
  • Fast-paced, action gameplay!
  • Shoot a big variety of monsters!
  • Ride a Unicorn!
  • Fight a big, challenging, gruesome boss!
